name: Introduction to Theater and Performance Studies
description: This course is an introduction to theater and performance studies, covering the history of theater, performance styles, and the ways in which theater and performance are studied.

name: Acting I
description: This course is an introduction to acting techniques, covering the basics of acting, improvisation, and scene study.
prerequisites: Introduction to Theater and Performance Studies

name: Theater Directing I
description: This course is an introduction to directing techniques, covering the basics of directing, storytelling, and working with actors.
prerequisites: Introduction to Theater and Performance Studies

name: Theater Directing II
description: This course is a more advanced look at directing techniques, covering advanced topics such as working with designers, physical movement, and production management.
prerequisites: Introduction to Theater and Performance Studies
